::DarkMouse::

She saw the missle pass her and watched at the hit the trees and cut 
off her path.  She let her logic circuits go and let her instincts 
take over.  She turned and looke at Starscream. "SO you want to take 
on a mouse huh? This mouse bites back."  She fired her optic lazars 
at Starscream.  She then jumped up and started to climb over the 
fallen trees.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (JP, You are forgetting Drillbit's attack on Inferno.)
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream saw the bot fall down twice, giving him time to catch up 
a 
> bit. The only problem was that he had to manuver through all of the 
> trees. He was catching her though. Time to cut her off......
> 
> Starscream launcheed a missled into a tree a few metres infront of 
> her into a tree, causing it to catch on fire and fall down, 
blocking 
> her path. He continued the chase.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon was getting ready to attack the Ark, when he decided to 
check 
> up on the three chips he had installed in three different bots. He 
> went to the computer and checked their status.
> 
> The first was Savage. Everything was fine. Prebon had complete 
> controll over him.
> 
> The second was Koj. The chip was giving off no signs of anything.
> 
> "Damt it! He must have used those Ninja powers of his to defeat it. 
> Well, it might be somewhere in the Maximal base, so it could still 
be 
> of some use. Chip 30175A, self destruct!"
> 
> The chip exploded wherever Koj has put it.
> 
> The thirs was Spears. He was waiting for this. He examined the 
> readings. Most of the time it had complete contro, but than there 
are 
> some blanks that could not be accounted for. The Maximal Chip. They 
> have both intergrated themselves into her vital systems. Removing 
> either one would result in immediate termination. When he got her 
> back he would find a way to fix that though. She must be going 
nuts, 
> not remembering stuff that well. Just than the message came in from 
> Spears. Time to go.
> 
> "Trainers! We are leaving early and going to Spears' positio. I've 
> locked onto it. She wants to return to us. We must go rescue our 
lost 
> comrade! And perhaps we could pick up a dead body and place the 
spark 
> of Lightrade in it! We must go!"
> 
> The other Trainers left the base and hopped on Savage with their 
> cloaks on, ready to go. Prebon waited, signaling for Slayer to come.
